overview: Moscow, spring 2020. The city is being quarantined. Polina understands that she will not be able to spend this time in a musty one-room apartment with her mother and stepfather. She finds her own father on Facebook, whom she has not seen for more than 10 years, and goes to his country house for the duration of quarantine. Now they have time to finally get to know each other.
title: Single Twice
